title: Front-end Developer
description: Develop user-friendly, responsive and visually appealing web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field, 3+ years of experience in front-end development, experience with React or Angular.

title: Software Engineer
description: Design, develop, and test software solutions using Java and SQL.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field, 5+ years of experience in software engineering, experience with Java and SQL.

title: Product Manager
description: Define and drive product vision and roadmap for new and existing products.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or related field, 7+ years of experience in product management, experience in agile methodologies.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design and develop engaging user interfaces and experiences for web and mobile applications.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Design or related field, 3+ years of experience in UI/UX design, proficiency in Sketch, Photoshop, and InVision.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Manage and automate cloud infrastructure and deployment pipelines.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field, 5+ years of experience in DevOps or related field, experience with AWS or Azure.

title: Data Scientist
description: Analyze and model data to provide insights and solutions to business problems.

title: Backend Developer
description: Build scalable, reliable and high-performance APIs using Node.js, Python or Java.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field, 3+ years of experience in backend development, experience with Node.js, Python or Java.

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Design and develop native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field, 5+ years of experience in mobile app development, proficiency in Swift, Kotlin, or React Native.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Identify and mitigate cybersecurity threats and vulnerabilities.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Cybersecurity or related field, 3+ years of experience in cybersecurity analysis, experience with SIEM tools and incident response.

title: Cloud Architect
description: Design and implement cloud-based solutions for scalability, security and high availability.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field, 5+ years of experience in cloud architecture, experience with AWS or Azure.
